text: David John Croft, (born David John Andrew Sharland; 7 September 1922 â€“ 27 September 2011) was an English writer, producer, and director. He created the BBC television sitcom Dad's Army. Croft was born on 7 September 1922 in Sandbanks, Poole, Dorset, England. He studied at the Rugby School and at Royal Military College, Sandhurst. Croft was married to Ann Callender from 1952 until his death in 2011. They had seven children.
